text: Israelia fomɨra men avɨribav soghezɨ me ariaghire, egha bar me kuavaremezir puvatɨzɨ, men ovavir borir vabara ikiavɨra iti. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn Solomon me gamizɨma, me puram an ingangarir gumazir kɨnibar mɨn otivigha, datɨrɨghɨn ikia kamaghɨra iti.8:8 Akar kam, “datɨrɨghɨn ikia kamaghɨra iti,” a datɨrɨghɨn en dughiar kamɨn mɨgeir puvatɨ. A gumazir akɨnafarir kam osirizimɨn dughiamɨn gun mɨgei.
